ack.p: The authors would like to thank all online MOOC survey participants and all students of the general MOOC, the Francophone MOOC, and the MOOC for policymakers. Furthermore, the authors would like to thank Raissa Sorgho who helped translate the online survey into French. The authors also thank the MOOC Factory of the Centre Virchow-Villermé for Public Health Paris-Berlin and all involved in the creation of the MOOCs.

We acknowledge financial support by Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft within the funding program for Open Access Publishing, and by the Baden-Württemberg Ministry of Science, Research and the Arts and by Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg.
We furthermore would like to thank Julia M. Challinor for her editorial support.
